platform.util

Interface Output

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Display
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwingDisplay, Transform, View

    public interface Output
    Provides a rendering context, with its own coordinate system (i.e. unit is not guaranteed to be the pixel, the implementation is free to scale objects).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawSprite(Sprite sprite, Box location)
      Draws a sprite in specified area.
      void drawSprite(Sprite sprite, Box location, double angle)
      Draw a sprite in specified area, rotated around the center.
      void drawSprite(Sprite sprite, Box location, double angle, double transparency)
      Draw an alpha-blended sprite in specified area, rotated around the center.
      Box getBox() 

    • Method Detail

      • getBox

        Box getBox()
        Returns:
        visible bounds, i.e. elements outside this area are not visible

      • drawSprite

        void drawSprite(Sprite sprite,
                Box location)
        Draws a sprite in specified area.
        Parameters:
        sprite - image to render, not null
        location - rectangular area, not null

      • drawSprite

        void drawSprite(Sprite sprite,
                Box location,
                double angle)
        Draw a sprite in specified area, rotated around the center.
        Parameters:
        sprite - image to render, not null
        location - rectangular area, not null
        angle - counter-clockwise angle, in radians

      • drawSprite

        void drawSprite(Sprite sprite,
                Box location,
                double angle,
                double transparency)
        Draw an alpha-blended sprite in specified area, rotated around the center.
        Parameters:
        sprite - image to render, not null
        location - rectangular area, not null
        angle - counter-clockwise angle, in radians
        transparency - transparency multiplier, between 0.0 and 1.0
